name: Test Sword
description: A comprehensive test sword with various stat modifiers
tooltip: You gain 10% critical chance while wielding this weapon.
You gain 5% dodge chance while wielding this weapon.
You gain -1 CON, +2 DEX, +3 STR while wielding this weapon.
You take 5% more fire damage while wielding this weapon.
You take 10% more slashing damage while wielding this weapon.
You gain +1 accuracy while wielding this weapon.
Slash (100%): Deals 1-8 + 5 * STR bonus slashing damage.
